meanings.definition: Nonbodies: Plural form of nonbody, referring to individuals who are not considered important or significant.
meanings.sent1: The nonbodies in the background quietly observed the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a nonbody in the bustling city crowd.
meanings.sent3: The nonbodies at the party were the first to leave, unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: In the world of celebrities, she was just a nonbody.
meanings.sent5: The nonbodies in the shadows seemed to blend into the night.

meanings.definition: Nonbodies: A group of people or entities that lack physical presence or substance.
meanings.sent1: The online forum was filled with nonbodies, hiding behind usernames.
meanings.sent2: The ghostly figures appeared as nonbodies in the mist.
meanings.sent3: The nonbodies in the virtual reality game were surprisingly chatty.
meanings.sent4: The nonbodies of the past haunted the old mansion.
meanings.sent5: The nonbodies of the dream world seemed to float weightlessly.
